entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lincoln
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:08 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning with risk of freezing rain. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 near noon then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High plus 4 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
